- District 3 Cedric L. Hicks, Sr.

# District 3 Cedric L. Hicks, Sr.

**Mayor Pro Tempore, District 3**  
**Cedric L. Hicks, Sr.**

Elected: November 2024  
Term Expires: November 2026   (310) 952-1700 [chicks@carsonca.gov](mailto:chicks@carsonca.gov)

Cedric L. Hicks, Sr. has been on the City Council since being appointed on April 19, 2016, and has been re-elected by the residents of Carson 3-times.  His vision for the City of Carson is to ensure a safe, clean and healthy community. He wants the City of Carson to be where all residents can reach their full potential through education, business, recreation and wellness.

[Read Hicks' full biography](https://carsonca.gov/government/elected_officials/CedricHicksBio.php).

District 3 Map  
![District 3 Map](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/districts/district3.jpg)

Achievements

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-leadership.png)

First African American Director of Community Services

 

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-partnership.png)

Encourages Collaborative Partnerships

 

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-safety.png)

Ensure a Safe, Clean, and Healthy Community

 

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-makehappen.png)

Motto: Make it Happen
